## Toolbox.getPreviouslySelectedItem() method

Gets the previously selected item.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getPreviouslySelectedItem(): ISelectableToolboxItem | null;
```
**Returns:**

[ISelectableToolboxItem](./blockly.iselectabletoolboxitem.md) \| null

The previously selected item, or null if no item was previously selected.
